source: TEXT_BANAMA201_01232_SEQ_00<tab>Narujj Boh wishes to capitalize on the panic you have sown.
target: TEXT_BANAMA201_01232_SEQ_00<tab>灰の陣営のナルジ・ボーは、冒険者に教えたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_BANAMA201_01232_SEQ_01<tab>Narujj Boh bids you infiltrate the Zanr'ak encampment and hunt down the agitated Amalj'aa clergy members. Slay Zanr'ak thaumaturges for their ritual tools, and Zanr'ak pugilists for their ritual offerings.
target: TEXT_BANAMA201_01232_SEQ_01<tab>ナルジ・ボーの依頼を受けた。ザンラク脇本陣にいる「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2075701 /var>」を討伐して「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88DB01 /var>」を2個、「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2075801 /var>」を討伐して「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88DC01 /var>」を2個入手しよう。

source: TEXT_BANAMA201_01232_SEQ_02<tab>You have slain the clergy members and their bodyguards. Return to the Ring of Ash, and deliver the ritual materials to Narujj Boh.
target: TEXT_BANAMA201_01232_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88DC01 /var>と<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88DB01 /var>を入手した。灰の陣営の「ナルジ・ボー」に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88DC01 /var>と<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88DB01 /var>を渡そう。

source: TEXT_BANAMA201_01232_SEQ_03<tab>Narujj Boh is pleased with the disruption your deeds have caused among the enemy's ranks. Without the necessary ritual materials, the clergy's plans to summon their god have been substantially delayed.
target: TEXT_BANAMA201_01232_SEQ_03<tab>ナルジ・ボーに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88DC01 /var>と<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88DB01 /var>を渡した。敵のアマルジャ族から奪った蛮神召喚の祭具を、満足そうに見るナルジ・ボー。目論見通り、しばらくは蛮神の召喚を止めることができると彼は語った。またの機会に協力しよう。

source: TEXT_BANAMA201_01232_TODO_00<tab>Obtain ritual tools from Zanr'ak thaumaturges.
TEXT_BANAMA201_01232_TODO_01<tab>Obtain ritual offerings from Zanr'ak pugilists.
TEXT_BANAMA201_01232_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the ritual materials to Narujj Boh.
target: TEXT_BANAMA201_01232_TODO_02<tab>ナルジ・ボーに祭器を渡す

source: TEXT_BANAMA201_01232_NARUJIBOH_000_000<tab>I see panic among the ranks of the Zahar'ak fools. It is your deeds, honored ally, that have sown these seeds of discord.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA201_01232_NARUJIBOH_000_000頃来、ザハラク戦陣の者たちの動きが変わった。
お主の活躍が、奴らの動向を狂わせているに違いなし。

source: TEXT_BANAMA201_01232_NARUJIBOH_000_001<tab>Even the priests who command our enemies have begun to show themselves in plain sight. The disruptions to their summoning preparations do not sit well with them.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA201_01232_NARUJIBOH_000_001奴らを指揮する立場にある司祭たちまでもが、
表だって動き始めた模様。
焔神を喚び寄せし計画に狂いが生じ、焦っていると見える。

source: TEXT_BANAMA201_01232_NARUJIBOH_000_002<tab>Let us further stir the pot, fellow warrior. I bid you slay the members of Ifrit's clergy─the Zanr'ak thaumaturges─and their bodyguard pugilists, as well.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA201_01232_NARUJIBOH_000_002好機到来ぞ、強き者よ。
焔神に仕える司祭「」と、
その侍従「」を討ち果たされよ！

source: TEXT_BANAMA201_01232_NARUJIBOH_000_003<tab>Seize from their lifeless shells what ritual tools and offerings they carried. Leave their brethren nothing with which to perform their unholy rites.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA201_01232_NARUJIBOH_000_003地に骸をさらし、司祭たちから祭具や供物を奪うのだ。
さすれば、奴らが取り仕切る、邪なる儀式も滞ろうぞ。

source: TEXT_BANAMA201_01232_NARUJIBOH_000_011<tab>Hunt down the Zanr'ak thaumaturges and pugilists and take from them their ritual materials. With a single act, we thin our foe's numbers and hamper their unholy rites.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA201_01232_NARUJIBOH_000_011標的は「」と、
「」である。
奴らより、祭具や供物を奪ってまいられい。

source: TEXT_BANAMA201_01232_NARUJIBOH_000_021<tab>These weaklings that beseech a god for strength, and earn nothing through honorable battle, deserve <var 1A 02 /var>nothing<var 1A 01 /var>! Slaughter Ifrit's priests, and seize from them their ritual tools.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA201_01232_NARUJIBOH_000_021己の弱さを鍛えることなく、
安易に神にすがりつくとは、脆弱千万！
司祭たちから儀式に用いる祭具や供物を奪うのだ。

source: TEXT_BANAMA201_01232_NARUJIBOH_000_022<tab>You pull the fangs off our enemy, honored ally. The thaumaturges were foolish to so reveal themselves.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA201_01232_NARUJIBOH_000_022うむ、これぞまさしく焔神を祀る祭具と供物。
奴らめ、焦って姿を見せたことが裏目に出たか。

source: TEXT_BANAMA201_01232_NARUJIBOH_000_023<tab>Every mistake they make shall cost them dearly. And should they endeavor to fashion new tools for their rites? Well, I have the perfect warrior to once more unleash into their midst.
target:
TEXT_BANAMA201_01232_NARUJIBOH_000_023お主のおかげで、奴らはさらに焦るであろう。
いずれ再び祭具は作られるであろうが、
其の時には、また奪えば済むだけのことよ。
